basics.label: Data Scientist & Engineer
basics.summary: Data scientist and engineer with a PhD in Mathematics and hands-on experience delivering machine learning solutions across research and industry. Security cleared and experienced working in cross-functional teams. Skilled in developing ML solutions, translating complex technical insights into actionable stakeholder recommendations, and advancing responsible AI adoption with strong model governance.

work.name: Veolia
work.summary: Designed and validated predictive models for telemetry anomaly detection, developed modular time series toolkit, and led digitalisation initiatives.
highlights: Designed and validated predictive models for telemetry anomaly detection, improving early identification of operational issues.
Developed a modular time series toolkit with anomaly detection and model validation workflows using Streamlit and FastAPI.
Led evaluation of Generative AI use cases and integrated them into existing workflows.
Automated complex data reconciliation pipelines, improving data quality and reducing manual reporting cycles by 67%.
Collaborated with domain experts to interpret model results and generate actionable insights for risk-aware decision-making.

work.name: Science to Data Science (S2DS)
work.summary: Built LLM-powered NLP pipelines, integrated automated testing and evaluation metrics, and aligned model design with operational constraints.
highlights: Built modular, testable LLM-powered NLP pipelines with LangChain, Pytest, and reproducibility controls.
Aligned ML model design with operational constraints, focusing on explainability and deployment readiness.
Conducted peer reviews of ML pipelines to ensure compliance with organisational standards.
Led internal discussions on LLM evaluation strategies, including prompt injection testing and hallucination assessment.

work.name: Scottish Tech Army
work.summary: Conducted technical and process risk assessments to modernise document and data systems for accessibility, scalability, and security.
highlights: Conducted risk assessments to modernise document and data systems, advising on security, scalability, and cloud readiness.
Analysed storage practices, recommended Azure solutions, and designed scalable folder structures for long-term use.

education.summary: Independent novel research in algebraic geometry, developing computational algorithms to compute graph structures. Collaborative research with the University of Washington. Presented research in Cambridge, London, and Paris.
Specialised in Differential Equations & Numerical Methods.
